item.title: Kick off this festive season with Fortune’s ultimate luxury gift guide
item.description: Unsure what to buy your loved ones this festive season? Look no further.

item.title: Elon Musk’s DOGE partner Vivek Ramaswamy says they’ll scrutinize $6.6 billion Biden loan to Tesla rival Rivian
item.description: Critics advise the incoming Trump administration to pull the plug on 'corporate-welfare loans handed out for political reasons'.
